00019 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_SRQ_H
00020 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_SRQ_H
00021 
00022 #include <asm/rtai_vectors.h>
00023 
00024 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00025 
00026 static inline long long rtai_srq(int srq, unsigned long args)
00027 {
00028         long long retval;
00029         RTAI_DO_TRAP(RTAI_SYS_VECTOR, retval, srq, args);
00030         return retval;
00031 }
00032 
00033 static inline int rtai_open_srq(unsigned int label)
00034 {
00035         return (int)rtai_srq(0, label);
00036 }
00037 
00038 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ */
00039 
00040 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_I386_SRQ_H */
